page.title: 11ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We moved house to Urchfont for we needed a bigger house.I used to live in Devizes,Wiltshire.The postmen used to complain when people put Wilts on are letters in stead of Wiltshire. I used to go to Southbroom infant school.My teacher was Mrs Taylor.Who I quite liked.When I was a first year I worked slowly because nobody new I needed glases.We moved to Urchfont in 1980 on the 10th of January.My dad still kept the same job.My dad is a surveyor.He does the written work at home ,but measures mostly at army bases.There are quite a few bases he goes to.Like Corshum,Yeovilton and Wroughton.He sometimes has to measure in underground bomb bunkers.He has secret plans of military bases and when he has learnt the way round the base he has to burn the plan.
